member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiQueryProfile.Classic
member.summary: Ranking based on the number of incoming links, some templates, page language and recency (templates/language/recency may not be activated on this wiki).

member.summary: Ranking based on some templates, page language and recency when activated on this wiki.

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiQueryProfile.Empty
member.summary: Ranking based solely on query dependent features (for debug only).

member.summary: Weighted sum based on incoming links

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiQueryProfile.WeightedSumIncomingLinksAndPageViews
member.summary: Weighted sum based on incoming links and weekly pageviews

member.summary: Ranking based primarily on page views

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiQueryProfile.PopularIncomingLinks
member.summary: Ranking based primarily on incoming link counts

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiQueryProfile.AutoSelect
member.summary: Let the search engine decide on the best profile to use.

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiWhat.Title
member.summary: Search in page titles (default) (if search engine doesn't support title searches, such as Lucene which is used by Wikipedia, then it falls back to text)

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiWhat.Text
member.summary: Search in page text

member.name: F:Genbox.Wikipedia.Enums.WikiWhat.NearMatch
member.summary: Search for titles that match exactly. Example: 'Microsoft' results in 'Microsoft', where 'Microsof' results in 'no results'

member.name: M:Genbox.Wikipedia.Extensions.EnumExtensions.GetConcatValues(System.Enum)
member.summary: Convert a flags enum into a sequence of string values concatenated with |. E.g. Value1|Value2.

member.name: M:Genbox.Wikipedia.Extensions.EnumExtensions.GetStringValue(System.Enum)
member.summary: Will get the string value for a given enums value, this will only work if you assign the StringValue attribute to the items in your enum. Source: http://weblogs.asp.net/stefansedich/archive/2008/03/12/enum-with-string-values-in-c.aspx

member.summary: This attribute is used to represent a string value for a value in an enum.

member.summary: Constructor used to init a StringValue Attribute

member.summary: Holds the string value for a value in an enum.

member.summary: The URI that points to the wikipedia page that contains the title. Note: Normalization of the title occurs automatically.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiMediaRequest.Assert
member.summary: Verify that the user is logged in if set to user, not logged in if set to anon, or has the bot user right if bot.

member.summary: Verify the current user is the named user.

member.summary: Include the hostname that served the request in the results.

member.summary: Include the current timestamp in the result.

member.summary: Include the languages used for uselang and errorlang in the result.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiMediaRequest.RequestId
member.summary: Any value given here will be included in the response. May be used to distinguish requests.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiMediaRequest.LanguageVariant
member.summary: Variant of the language. Only works if the base language supports variant conversion.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiMediaRequest.ErrorFormat
member.summary: Format to use for warning and error text output

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiMediaRequest.ErrorUseLocalLanguage
member.summary: If given, error texts will use locally-customized messages from the MediaWiki namespace.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikipediaClient.UseTls
member.summary: Set to true to use HTTPS instead of HTTP. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikipediaClient.DefaultLanguage
member.summary: The default language to use. Can be overriden on each request.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.Query
member.summary: Search for page titles or content matching this value. You can use the search string to invoke special search features, depending on what the wiki's search backend implements.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.NamespacesToInclude
member.summary: The namespace(s) to enumerate. Defaults to .

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.Limit
member.summary: How many total pages to return. Default: 10, Max: 500

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.Offset
member.summary: When more results are available, use this to continue. Default: 0

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.QueryIndependentProfile
member.summary: Query independent profile to use (affects ranking algorithm). Defaults to

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.WhatToSearch
member.summary: Which type of search to perform.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.InfoToInclude
member.summary: What metadata to return. Default: TotalHits, Suggestion

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.PropertiesToInclude
member.summary: What property to include in the results. Defaults to a combination of snippet, size, word count and timestamp

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.IncludeInterWikiResults
member.summary: Include InterWiki results in the search, if available.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.EnableRewrites
member.summary: Enable internal query rewriting. Some search backends can rewrite the query into another which is thought to provide better results, for instance by correcting spelling errors.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.SortOrder
member.summary: Set the sort order of returned results. Defaults to Relevance.

member.name: P:Genbox.Wikipedia.WikiSearchRequest.WikiLanguage
member.summary: What language to use. Default: English (en)
